metadata.title: Qi and Lim Advances in Difference Equations Monotonicity properties for a ratio of finite many gamma functions Dedicated to people facing and fighting COVID-19

abstract.text: In the paper, the authors consider a ratio of finite many gamma functions and find its monotonicity properties such as complete monotonicity, the Bernstein function property, and logarithmically complete monotonicity.
